Description:
Verify that dragging onto a frame-set
      page loads the dragged content properly.

Verify that you can stop a form's data from being saved from
      the popup dialog box, and you click no.

Determine whether Customzing Netscape 6 help content displays
        correctly
Determine whether the Feedback Center displays correctly

Determine whether images load directly into the web browser from a
        local hard drive.
Determine if Shockwave movies work properly
Find with and without case sensitivity. Test Find Again.
Select and copy strings from the source window.
Verify that the correct items are in the taskbar.
